name: Wash Machine Free
description:
A Very Fun small game!
Are you a professional of Washing Machine?
Dirty laundry accumulates in the basket.
You must fill washing machines, start them and put the clean laundry on the clothesline.
Beware, it goes faster and faster!
You must keep rythm ever increasing.
The best score and the last score are recorded.
Try to become a "Professional" ... an "Expert" ... or maybe even Better!

••• Game Features •••

• Graphics are very fun
• Cartoon Look
• The difficulty ever increases
• Take the dirty laundry and launch it in the washing machines
• Very Fun small game
